comments.name: remarks
comments.value: Gets a component (that represents additional capabilities) for an item stack.

comments.name: param
comments.value:
The identifier of the component (e.g., 'minecraft:food').
If no namespace prefix is specified, 'minecraft:' is assumed.
Available component IDs can be found as part of the {@link ItemComponentTypes} enum.

comments.name: returns
comments.value: Returns the component if it exists on the item stack, otherwise undefined.
